mapper.select: SELECT id, name, initial, color, password, email FROM users
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, name, initial, color, password, email) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{initial}, #{color}, #{password}, #{email});
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, initial = #{initial}, color = #{color}, password = #{password}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id};
